infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: We access your calendar only if you choose to save meetups, reminders, or listing-related events.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: We use your contacts only if you choose to share a listing or invite a friend. We donâ€™t upload your address book.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use the camera so you can take photos for your listings and profile.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to show nearby listings and improve map results.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library so you can choose photos for listings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We save photos to your library only when you choose to.
